title: File Path Handling in Golang | Challenge
description: The filepath package in Golang provides functions to parse and construct file paths in a way that is portable between operating systems.

meta.description: Explore the `filepath` package in Golang and learn how to perform various file path operations, including constructing portable paths, splitting paths, and finding relative paths.
meta.keywords: Golang, file paths, filepath package, programming tutorials, file operations, portable paths, relative paths
